title: The 30-Year-Old Secret
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we stepped back into The Crime Zone. We found an eerie story on a Reddit “confessions” thread about a family, their sociopathic baby and a haunting secret.

Black Business of the Week - Jeff Jenkins https://www.chubbydiaries.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Native - Many conventional deodorants contain aluminum, which forms a plug in your sweat glands to keep you from sweating. But Native’s deodorant is made without aluminum, so you can feel better about what you’re putting on your body while smelling and feeling fresh all day long. Native deodorant is formulated without aluminum, parabens, or talc, and made with ingredients you’ve actually heard of, like coconut oil and shea butter. It comes in over 10 scents like Coconut & Vanilla and Lavender & Rose. For 20% off your first purchase, visit https://www.nativedeodorant.com and use promo code friendzone during checkout.

BET’s Boomerang - BET owns Wednesday nights with two shows from Emmy® winning writer and executive producer Lena Waithe (WAY-TH). March 11 at 10:30/9:30 central: catch the return of Boomerang. This season, Simone and Bryson aren’t what they used to be…and neither are their friends. Find out what drama returns to haunt the crew—and where loyalties lie…somewhere between their feelings--and the facts. Will losing at love be sacrificed for winning at life? Boomerang hits after an all new Twenties at 10. Twenties is the bold comedy everyone is buzzing about. Hailed by Deadline as a show that “redefines the Black Queer narrative”, Twenties follows three friends—one queer and two straight--navigating life, love and working in Hollywood. BET delivers two great ways to spend your Wednesday nights. Catch the season premiere of Boomerang Wednesday, March 11th at 10:30/9:30 central right after an all new Twenties-only on BET. For all things Boomerang and Twenties, visit https://www.BET.com.

Handy - With Handy, there’s a better way to knock out your spring cleaning this year. Handy is the easy and convenient way to book home cleanings on a schedule that works for you. Book a home cleaning in just 60-seconds, and Handy will match you with a top-rated Pro in your area. Choose a weekly, biweekly, or monthly plan; Handy schedules your recurring bookings for you. With Handy’s upfront pricing, what you see is what you pay, and you can pay and tip securely on the app. Handy’s Pros are background checked and rated by customers to ensure quality. Learn more about Handy’s background checks at Handy.com/trust-and-safety. If you're not satisfied with the service, they’ll make it right at no extra charge. For our listeners, Handy has a special limited time offer. Get your first 3-hour cleaning for ONLY $29 when you sign up for a cleaning plan. Go to https://www.handy.com/friendzone and enter promo code FRIENDZONE.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
